sect1.title: All Pairs Shortest Path
sect1.para:
This filter is based on the Floyd-Warshall algorithm.
Select an attribute name representing the relation weights.
Select directed/undirected mode for the relations.
Select inverse weight. Tick this option if the attribute selected is a probability rather than a weight or a distance.
The algorithm computes the shortest paths between all possible pairs of concepts resulting in the removal of all relations that are not part of these shortest paths (and are hence inefficient).
After a little wait, the results show a filtered network with some relations removed.
